base_prompt_suffix: A digital painting in a vibrant, stylized fantasy art style for a top-down RPG. The asset should have clean lines, rich colors, and a slightly painterly texture. It should be easily recognizable at small sizes.

style_modifiers.global: digital painting, vibrant colors, clean lines, fantasy art, painterly texture, top-down perspective
style_modifiers.icon: simple background, centered, clear silhouette, high contrast
style_modifiers.sprite: dynamic pose, expressive, no background, consistent lighting from top-left
style_modifiers.texture: seamless, tileable, repeating pattern, uniform lighting

negative_prompt: photorealistic, 3d render, blurry, noisy, text, watermark, signature, ugly, deformed
